data.text:
I can not rave enough, how wonderful this hotel is. I wish we stayed longer.

We checked in late at night, and the young gentleman (with glasses on the 18th March for room 807)at the front desk, was so sweet , welcoming and friendly. This is what makes a hotel memorable. Staff that are like this. He said we got a free upgrade, and we had the most beautiful room.
He is an asset to the hotel….in case you read this.
We have travelled for a month now, and I can tell you , these people,e are few and far between.

Everything was perfect in our room.

We were on the 8th floor , overlooking the plaza. Absolutely stunning!

So quiet. Air con. Great bed, amenities, etc.

The dinners was great, as was the breakfast buffet.

Perfect location! Wonderful staff! 

Can not say enough good things about this place. Hope to come back again!
data.title: Would rate TEN stars!✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear cazzi,
Thank you so much for this glowing review.
We are delighted to hear that our team made a positive impression on you with their excellent service and helpfulness. 
Also, we are glad to know that you could enjoy our breakfast selection and we appreciate your compliments on the room and the views, as we strive to provide a comfortable and enjoyable stay for our guests.
It is also great to know that our location was ideal for you.
The entire team look forward to welcoming you back for a future visit.
Kind regards,
Eli Vecina
owner_response.author: Olivia Hotels

data.text:
It was fantastic the location.
amazing hotel very good size room very comfortable bed, super clean.
the staff was very friendly and very helpful helped us booking restaurants and tours. Close to everything .
Highly recommended .definitely booking again for next summer .
Zena
data.title: Amazing location and great view from my room

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Zainabal5766ka, 
We would like to thank you for sharing your excellent experience on Tripadvisor following your stay at Olivia Plaza hotel. We are glad to know that you had a wonderful stay with us and that you appreciated our rooms. We would like to thank you for your kind words towards our colleagues, we are pleased to realise that they contributed to make your stay memorable. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Olivia Plaza hotel. 
Yours sincerely,

Daniel Hammers
Guest experience manager
owner_response.author: Olivia Hotels

data.text:
I stayed two nights then found out my mother died. I informed the hotel I needed an additional night and the response was. 

We don't have any rooms at "your rate". You must book an additional three nights in order to be considered for another room night... Call the front desk in the morning.

I had already stayed two nights.

Not only did the front desk agent increase the rate BUT ABSOLUTELY NO ONE offered condolences. It seemed like a strong arm hustle. I never asked for a discount but the price gauge was ridiculous... I told them it was in poor taste... they didn't offer condolences and the unprofessionalism of forcing me to pay for three additional days when my flight was in less than 12 hours was a reason for me never to revisit this hotel.

Booked my room using AMEX travel. Apparently they have a relationship with Experia for hotels. 

The first day I checked in the woman at the front desk reminded me that I booked the room from Expedia and I would be given an "undervalued room" despite it being $300 per night.

Relocated to this hotel. It's adorable, clean, modern and amid the pulse of the city.

STAFF
When the woman thought I was African she was rude. She lightened up a bit when she realized I was a proud American. The woman at the front seemed to think she was doing me a favor by giving me a room with a view of the alley.

ENGLISH
Some speak English. Menus are in English and Spanish. Room service staff was clean.

LOCATION
In the heart of the city but the area is sketchy like most of Barcelona in my opinion. As a tourist, you may want to consider this area or E!xample. Train station is directly in front of the hotel. Taxis are available 24/7

AMENITIES
Internet lounge with potato chips
Wine
Nespresso station
Seating
Computer

DINING
Courtyard restaurant
Bar
In room dining ( only 10 items)
Not a lot to choose from.
Few vegetarian options

Shopping
Everywhere you look is shopping. Located directly beside La Rambla where there's tons of shopping.

SAFETY
Use the safe in your hotel room to store valuables. Hotel is safe. The door man asked me if I had a reservation before he said Hello or opened the door which was pretty rude.

Pickpocketing and sketchy folks who stare. I'm a woman. Men make gestures. Stare back and give them the middle finger and they will leave you alone.

TRAVEL WISELY
Best to invest in a cross body bag placed in front of your body. Highly recommend a neck wallet. Leave your passport and valuables in the safe in your hotel room.
data.title: Don't like Americans. Horrible service when mother died

data.text: We have just returned from a wonderful stay at Hotel Olivia Barcelona , from the moment we arrived Emil & all the reception staff were all welcoming & friendly , great attention to detail, a very welcoming stay. Our room had a terrace balcony where we had our breakfast each day, a wonderful way to start the day taking in the views of Barcelona.  The hotel was in a fantastic location beside Las Ramblas /the Gothic quarter. The hotel was lovely and clean, and had great amenities, we look forward to returning.
data.title: Wonderful hotel, fantastic location, staff & amenities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ACalDub,
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Olivia Plaza.
We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our prime location and also starting the day having breakfast in your beautiful room's terrace.
Our dedicated team is always eager to provide excellent service, and we are glad that their efforts contributed to your satisfaction. It's also great to know that you appreciated the cleanliness of the hotel.
We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.
Best wishes,
Eli Vecina
owner_response.author: Olivia Hotels

data.text:
Very good service and quality.
Not far to metro, bus station, shops and restaurant or local Sagrada Famili....
It is center of barcelona old town next to plaza catalonia.
Reception is very helpfull and breakfast is grate.
data.title: Very pleasent stay in Old Town in Barcelona.
